metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0350 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
tmp_smtp.c in pktstat 1.8.5 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on /tmp/smtp.log.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0350` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pktstat - 1.8.5-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pktstat package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.5-3').
